duties_responsibilities.duty: Support new product development and sustaining activities for Medline.
Collaborate with product divisions to identify and advise on user needs and design requirements.
Lead multi-disciplinary product development teams to research, design, and develop new products and technologies.
Manage multiple project timelines and balance corporate priorities for product development projects.
Collaborate with product divisions to identify product development opportunities, establish innovation pipelines, and align product design efforts with long-term divisional strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering or a related field (Master's preferred)
